revised_title: Further Researches Among the Plants of the Coal-Measures: Discoveries of New Genera and Insights into the Internal Organization of Carboniferous Vegetation
tldr: The author examines and analyzes various plant specimens from the coal-measures, discovering new genera and providing insights into the internal organization of Carboniferous vegetation. The research includes the identification of new plant types, such as Ioxylon and Myxoxylon, and a deeper understanding of the structure and organization of plants like Asterophyllites and Zygopteris.
